verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, unto the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>.

remembering <S%G3421><s%> without <S%G89>ceasing<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2873>labor<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> in <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>;

how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G4136>assurance<s%>; even <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> what manner of <S%G3634>men<s%> we <S%G1096>showed<s%> ourselves <S%G1722>toward<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sake<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, having <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>;

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> hath sounded <S%G1837>forth<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G882>Achaia<s%>, but235, 2532 <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God-ward<s%> is gone <S%G1831>forth<s%>; so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G5532>anything<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G518>they<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G518>report<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> what manner <S%G3697>of<s%> entering <S%G1529>in<s%> we <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> ye <S%G1994>turned<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%>, <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> to wait <S%G362>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, even <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4506>delivereth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%>.
